titleStmt.title: The sounding voyce of the dread of Gods mighty power to all the iudges and rulers of the earth, who rise up against the Lamb, and to Gog, Magog, and all their armies, and to the whole host of the power of darkness, and to all men, who fight against God, who, or whatsoever they be (or whatsoever they are called).
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

titleStmt.title: The sounding voyce of the dread of Gods mighty power to all the iudges and rulers of the earth, who rise up against the Lamb, and to Gog, Magog, and all their armies, and to the whole host of the power of darkness, and to all men, who fight against God, who, or whatsoever they be (or whatsoever they are called).
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Humphrey Smith. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
